subject: Concussions
Suits and Litigation
Football
lead_paragraph: A ruling on the N.F.L.’s contention that the concussion-related lawsuits of more than 4,000 former players should not be heard in court is expected by this summer.
snippet: A ruling on the N.F.L.’s contention that the concussion-related lawsuits of more than 4,000 former players should not be heard in court is expected by this summer.
